message: “Women, many of whom are very young, are often coerced into prostitution by predators, taken advantage of, and are frequently victims of violence,” - William C. Lamar, U.S. attorney for northern Mississippi.

data.description: OXFORD, Miss. (AP) — A Tennessee man convicted in a multistate sex-trafficking case has been sentenced to two years in federal prison. The FBI and a federal prosecut
data.title: Man gets 2-year sentence in multistate sex trafficking case
